title: Additional Features
description: Further enhancements may include mobile and web support, and incorporation of a voxel editor within the game editor.

title: Enhancing the product
description: Terrain editing, procedural generation, and support for plugins will be added, enabling developers to extend the functionality of the game engine and editor with custom features.

title: Multiplayer Support
description: Implementation of multiplayer functionality will be completed, allowing players to interact and play together in the game environment.

title: Version 1 Release
description: The first official version of the project will be released, marking a major milestone in development. Integrating the game engine in the game editor.

title: Beta Release
description: The project has reached the beta stage, marking significant progress towards completion.

title: Idea Pivot
description: After one month, the project direction shifted to become a game engine and game editor based on voxels.

title: Moonshot
description: The project began as a voxel model editor.
